DOC.brief_summary: Background : Positive end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) time induction increase oxygenation prevent lung atelectasis . However , PEEP may prove beneficial case . Factors affect action PEEP elucidate well remain controversial . Pulmonary vasculature direct bearing action PEEP proven previous study . Thus study plan evaluate action PEEP basis pulmonary artery systolic pressure ( PASP ) non invasive easily measure trans-thoracic echocardiography . Methodology : This Randomized prospective study comprise 70 morbidly obese patient , ASA grade II III , age 20-65 year BMI > 40kg/m2 , schedule elective laparoscopic bariatric surgery . Ten patient exclude . Thus total 60 patient participate study . Thirty patient receive PEEP time induction 30 patient give PEEP 10cm H2O . Serial ABG sample take pre operatively , time intubation , 5 min intubation 10 min intubation . Patients divide four group basis PASP value ≤ 30 mm Hg without PEEP > 30 mm Hg
DOC.brief_title: Effect Positive End Expiratory Pressure Time Induction Morbidly Obese Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study conduct Department Of Anaesthesiology & Critical Care , Sri Aurobindo Institute Medical Sciences & P.G . Institute Mohak Hospitals , Indore , period one year . Seventy morbidly obese patient , ASA grade II III , age 20-65 year BMI > 40kg/m2 , schedule elective laparoscopic bariatric surgery select write informed consent obtain . All recruit patient underwent 2D-trans-thoracic echocardiography PASP record . Echocardiography perform cardiologist measurement operator dependent . Patients deny consent , undergo Emergency and/or open surgery require 2 attempt intubation exclude . Arterial line insert pre operatively ABG sample take hemodynamic parameter record do patient breathing room air . Both group pre-oxygenated 3 minute 100 % Oxygen . Standard procedure use induction anesthesia patient . No premedication give . All patient induce i.v . Glycopyrolate ( 0.005-0.01 mg/kg ) , i.v . Fentanyl ( 2µg/kg ) i.v . Propofol . Once patient become unresponsive verbal command , Succinylcholine administer dose 1- 1.5 mg/ kg . Mechanical ventilation start 100 % oxygen . A PEEP 10 cm H2O apply use four hand technique Study group control group receive PEEP . After one minute endotracheal intubation do . PEEP continue study group intubation . Arterial blood gas ( ABG ) analysis hemodynamic parameter record follow stage : 1 . Just inflation cuff endotracheal tube 2 . 5 minute post intubation 3 . 10 minute post intubation Patients divide four group basis PASP : Group 1 : Patients PASP ≤ 30 mmHg receive PEEP ( n= 11 ) Group 2 : PASP ≤ 30 mm Hg receive PEEP 10 cm H2O ( n= 11 ) Group 3 : PASP > 30 mm Hg receive PEEP ( n= 19 ) Group 4 : PASP > 30 mm Hg receive PEEP 10 cm H2O ( n=19 )
DOC.criteria: Patients recruit Anesthesia society Anesthesiologist ( ASA ) physical status l , II III , Aged 2065 year BMI > 40kg/m2 schedule elective laparoscopic bariatric surgery Patients deny consent Did fulfill inclusion criterion , patient undergo Emergency and/or open surgery Patients require 2 attempt intubation
